summary: A man, crippled in a climbing accident, returns to his cabin in the woods as part of his rehabilitation, but he wasn't prepared for the immanent onslaught.
cast: Matt McCoy|Haley Joel|Christien Tinsley|Karin Anna Cheung|Jeffrey Combs|Natalie Compagno|Michael Deak|Jim Giggans|Paul Gleason|Ashley Hartman|Lance Henriksen|Rex Linn|Phil Morris|James Morrison|Tiffany Shepis|Chad Smith|Dee Wallace|Ruby|Paul Spadone|Josh Wolfe|Steve Joyner|George Andrews|Dino Rokac|Ryan Schifrin
title: Abominable
